meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preventive.
meanings.sent1: Her preventiveness helped avoid accidents in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: Regular check-ups are a key part of preventiveness in healthcare.
meanings.sent3: His preventiveness was so strong that he even wore a helmet to bed.
meanings.sent4: The preventiveness of the security system was compared to a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The preventiveness of wearing sunscreen daily is crucial for skin protection.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of preventing something.
meanings.sent1: The preventiveness of vaccinations has led to a decrease in disease outbreaks.
meanings.sent2: Fire drills are a form of preventiveness in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The preventiveness of carrying an umbrella on a sunny day made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking was a preventiveness that stopped the argument from escalating.
meanings.sent5: The preventiveness of locking the door at night gives a sense of security.
